TopicTitle: Which features do you want in 0.22?

Articles.Content: I know its a space program with planes and jets but since kerbals need everything why not add a boat marina to make boats.

That is included in 'Improved IVA'...

One of the entries I voted for, for sure.

I'd honestly be happy with almost any new content they could add to the game. But I'm particularly excited about career mode and anything that adds a bit of /realism/ and depth to it, like aerodynamics, fairings, resources and much improved IVA(not to mention more IVA-able station/base parts and more parts in general).

I'd like to see a sort of Kerbals Progress Screen or something. An option that would allow me to name my missions and have a custom mission patch generator. Also, follow the progress of Kerbals and allow me to see how many missions they have flown, what type, what badges they have, etc. etc.

That is included in 'Improved IVA'...

Improved IVA... well, IVA can stay like it is, i would just like to have a "crew crossfeed" ability like the "fuel crossfeed" ability for modules So if you have a station with several crew-capable modules, you can move any astronaut to any crew module just by clicking. Just right-click an astronaut, alt-right-click the crew module and send him there. Or right click a crew module with someone in it, alt-right-click another crew module and - like with fuel (oxi and liquid) transfer kerbals in and out. That would make station life a lot easier, especially if you exchange crew from time to time

how about to add realism they add solar weather that occur at random which use solar flares and micro meteorites that can damage your craft at random points in time and endanger your crew and to counteract these events when they occur have like radiation shelters and ship repairs through eva and have the possibility of losing your crew from radiation exposure or damaged suits which can repaired when they reenter the craft.

maybe even have the other space center put to use at one point and add for career mode actually use the flight control center to observe launches in case of problems or even if possible although I'm sure is unlikely is to have for career mode show from the flight control the craft being moved to the launch from the VAB

Edit: and to add warning systems in case of solar flares set up probes at Lagrange points for a relay like with remotetech for missions

I think the aerodynamics has to come relatively soon. The longer they wait the harder it will be to change it

I put my vote in for resources and aerodynamics. I picked resources for the obvious reason of progressing toward career mode. I also chose aerodynamics because I spend a lot of time building spaceplanes and I would like them to work properly. I would also like to see a practical use for the "aerodynamic" nose cones, which at the moment just add weight. Perhaps in a later version they could be made to reduce drag, since flying what is essentially a flat wall into space is not exactly realistic. Fairings as well, though I wouldn't mind if they were purely aesthetic as long as they looked better than an array of flat, steel plates.
I would like to start my bloody ship with a command chair. i can start it with a landing leg, with a capsule, with a girder... but I can't start it with a command chair.
Resources and career mode! Sandbox is great, sometimes I like to have set goals. I have the Kethane mod but official support would make life a bit easier.
